TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ponaway, title = Ponaway, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponaway} }

S.FORM: Ponaway Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Ponaway a niyaro', 32 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 126 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 124 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal93%, Amis1%, Truku1%, roma4%.

Ponaway Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Ponaway a niyaro', 32 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 126 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 124 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal93%, Amis1%, Troko1%, roma4%.
